description: '''Henry Butler''' (September 21, 1948 – July 2, 2018) was an American [[jazz]] and blues pianist. He learned piano, drums, and saxophone in school. He received a college degree and graduate degree and taught at the [[New Orleans Center for Creative Arts]]. He worked as a soloist and in groups in Los Angeles and New York City. Despite his blindness, he spent time as a photographer and had his work exhibited in galleries.
